# toolPickerIsRulerActiveDidChange(_:)

**Instance Method**

Tells the observer when a person shows or hides the ruler.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor optional func toolPickerIsRulerActiveDidChange(_ toolPicker: PKToolPicker)
```

## Parameters

- **toolPicker**: The tool picker whose configuration changed.

## Detecting tool configuration changes

- **toolPickerSelectedToolItemDidChange(_:)**: Tells the observer when a person selects a new tool item.
